title: What is the name of the typography forum that requires you to use your full name as your username?
content:
Hi all,

I stumbled across another community like Typophile awhile ago but I cannot remember the name. It requires you to use your full name as your username, and seemed to be very active as a community, but I cannot find it after googling a few different search terms. Can you help me out here? I have seen it mentioned on these forums before, but I can't find the thread here either.

Best,

Simon
author: SimonRogers
